attributes.title: i’m really angry with this app
attributes.review: right before i downloaded the app my phone worked perfectly, but a few days after i got the app my phone started glitching out. I kept getting random notifications for apps i didn’t have, calls and text from unknown numbers about trump and his successes, and other weird things. DO NOT GET THIS APP IT WILL RUIN YOUR PHONE!!!

attributes.title: THIS APP IS MALWARE
attributes.review: Sending this from my iPad. This app shut my phone down. All of my information including icloud files were destroyed and may have been stolen. In fact after the app downloaded my iphone turned off. Then it caught on fire and lucifer ascended from the depths of hell to reclaim it, telling me never again to play god with the future of our nation.

attributes.title: Too many racist carrots
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to check out our president, but suddenly I saw penny wise and he asked “Are you coming to the tre?🌲🌳🌲🌳” I was shocked and ran away when suddenly a dinosaur appeared and bit my head off, but don’t worry, I grew a new one. So I went back on the app but found a racist carrot who is also a rapist on here. So therefore I give it a one star.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review:
This app is horrible. I locked myself in the bathroom. I’m sitting in the bathtub writing this review, warning you NOT to download it. My family doesn’t dare to enter. My brother hasn’t taken a shower in a month.
I’m cutting my fingers on the sharp edges of my cracked screen, but it’s worth it. A person reading this that doesn’t download this app is a life saved. Don’t end up like me.

attributes.title: Horrible review
attributes.review: I went to download the app and as soon as i clicked on it, it exploded my phone i’m currently using my toilet to write this out. my pet sink was taken from me just days prior this app is horrible i am all out of toilet plungers because of it... ice cubes and running and i can’t stop turkey... i’m sorry but not a good app flapperjacks/10 would not recommend

attributes.title: throw the whole app away😾
attributes.review:
one day i was scrolling through the app store and found this app🙄. i’m highly disappointed😤. i thought i was supposed to be getting my extra coupons🤑 as one does😻 and then boom it’s like i’m watching a horror movie🙀👻. jump scare after jump scare😳 of some cheeto man on my screen👺. i was so scared😿. i couldn’t believe my eyes👄. i do not appreciate my emotions being tampered with like that😾. of all things my coupon heart was just ripped to shreds💔.

(heart ❤️been broke 💔 so many times ⏰ i i don’t 🤷‍♀️know what to believe 💭 yeah 👍 mama 👩🏾 said it’s my fault 👎🏿)

..... it’s completely unacceptable😡.

attributes.title: disgusting,horrible, DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: i cant even fathom what just happened. i am shook to my core with what this app has just done. i downloaded it and as soon as i opened the app and entered my phone number i start getting calls from trump himself threatening to expose my address if i don’t give him feet pics. this was the most traumatic experience ever. i hate you.

attributes.title: TRASHHH
attributes.review: trashhhhh, i is a day for a new friends who love you forever and have your own dreams come on my mind right i was a great night out there was so many things i is a great game and i is the way you are the one to get the one that is the who you wanna is to the point where you goin was goin is a great game to but you have a lot outposts was the worst app to get to be mmh was  one ever played u.

attributes.title: Chinese Russian terrorist communist app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and a link popped up on my screen. I clicked it thinking it led to more info on My beloved Trump, but instead it glitched and made it unable for me to turn on my phone. My screen eventually turned on and had Chinese and Russian words. What kind of Chinese Russian communist nonsense is this?! This is a FAKE app and it needs to be deleted IMMEDIATELY! ZERO STARS!

attributes.title: Actually Good?
attributes.review: Actually found out this was really helpful, really kept me up to date on things 😀
